ygData.subject: Re: Bardic guild on Tunare
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not on Tunare - but I m curious why you d want to be in a Bard-only guild. In my opinion - the biggest advantage of a guild is to more easily find people
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not on Tunare - but I'm curious why you'd want to be in a Bard-only
guild. In my opinion - the biggest advantage of a guild is to more easily
find people at similar level; to group with. I have had some success in
larger groups with another bard; but the couple of times I'd been in a group
with two other bards - I felt I'd have been better off with a more diverse
group. I'm a big proponent of "combined arms" tactics...

I've been in a couple of guilds - and I actually like the fact that in my
current guild - I'm the only bard (makes my services to be in very high
demand!)

Slyde


----- Original Message -----
From: RaceFace <bean@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, October 18, 1999 7:18 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Bardic guild on Tunare


> From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>
>
> Hello.
>
> I've got my bard up to 10th level now, and really enjoy playing him. I'm
> wondering if there's any sort of guild, or at least network of bards on
the
> Tunare server. I would think that bards would like to form a guild, since
> we're one of the more unique types of classes available.
